components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Sudani One Network in Sudan

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience outbound SMS delivery delay when sending messages to Sudani One network in Sudan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience outbound SMS delivery delay when sending messages to Sudani One network in Sudan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience outbound SMS delivery delay when sending messages to Sudani One network in Sudan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing outbound SMS delivery delay when sending messages to Sudani One network in Sudan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS Delivery Delays when sending messages to the Sudani One network in Sudan. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

Our engineers are still investigating data delays for Twilio Rest API, impacting Twilio Calls. Current calls are available without any delays, and the data consistency issues that are still outstanding are only for a subset of calls that took place during the incident window from 7:40 to 11:15 PT. Our next update will be provided in 8 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers are still investigating data delays for Twilio Rest API, impacting Twilio Calls. Current calls are available without any delays, and the data consistency issues that are still outstanding are only for a subset of calls that took place during the incident window from 7:40 to 11:15 PT. Our next update will be provided in 4 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers are still investigating data delays for Twilio Rest API, impacting Twilio Calls. Current calls are available without any delays, and the data consistency issues that are still outstanding are only for a subset of calls that took place during the incident window from 7:40 to 11:15 PT. Our next update will be provided in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

This incident causing data delays for Twilio REST API and Calls was prematurely resolved in one of our previous posts. Please refer to https://status.twilio.com/incidents/syqxvbptx9zn for previous updates. Current calls are available without any delays, and the data consistency issues that are still outstanding are only for a subset of calls that took place during the incident window from 7:40 to 11:15 PT. Our engineers are still working on a fix. Our next update will be provided in 1 hour. We apologize for the inconvenience and for any confusion this may have caused.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 December 2022 at 02:30 PST until 01 December 2022 at 03:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to and from subset of Twilio Australia and New Zealand phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Indonesia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Hutchison CP Telecommunications (3)

incident_updates.body: The Hutchison CP Telecommunications (3) network in Indonesia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 01 December 2022 at 08:30 PST until 01 December 2022 at 11:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Hutchison CP Telecommunications (3) Indonesia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 December 2022 at 14:00 PST until 01 December 2022 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small carriers in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 01 December 2022 at 21:00 PST until 02 December 2022 at 03:00 PST . During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The StarHub network in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 December 2022 at 09:00 PST until 03 December 2022 at 15:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from StarHub Singapore handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 04 December 2022 at 20:30 PST until 05 December 2022 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to and from subset of Twilio USA Phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Rakuten Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Rakuten Mobile network in Japan is conducting an emergency maintenance from 5 December 2022 at 05:00 PDT until 5 December 2022 at 12:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Rakuten Mobile Japan handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: UK SMS Carrier Maintenance - Stour Marine

incident_updates.body: The Stour Marine network in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 15:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Stour Marine UK handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 16:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio Germany and Austria phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance to Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 December 2022 at 13:00 PST until 06 December 2022 at 14:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the following countries via a subset of longcodes.

Germany,
Spain,
United Kingdom,
Brazil.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 07 December 2022 at 14:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Canada will be conducting planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 08 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from both US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 08 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US handsets via US Toll-free numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, December 10th, 2022, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours 30 minutes. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Canada will be conducting planned maintenance from 14 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 15 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from both US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: The StarHub network in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 December 2022 at 08:00 PST until 17 December 2022 at 14:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from StarHub Singapore handsets.

Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance from 28 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 29 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US handsets via US Toll-free numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance beginning 29 Nov 2022 at 10:00 PST until 02 Dec 2022 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, WhatsApp senders may each experience downtimes of up to 15 minutes, which can result in delayed deliveries for WhatsApp messages sent to/from these senders during this brief period.
